p.s: The novel Gun Love, written by Jennifer Clement, published in 2019, deals with the fourteen yearsyear old maincharactermain character Pearl France and her mother Margot, who was a teenage mother, suffering from terrible living conditions at a trailer park in Florida.

The given excerpt from this novel, from p. 92-93, deals with Pearl meeting two other foster children Helen and Leo at the foster home, where the CPSChild Protective Services brought Pearl because her mother got shot.
In the following I am going to summarise the situation of Helen like it is presented in the given excerpt.
She was sent from foster home to foster home so many times and were treated badly at all these foster homes.
Helen doesn't even know who her family is.
From all these changes she got a mental illness, which explains that she is talking to herself in the third pearsonperson.
She even knows how to deal with bugs, this shows that she had to be at very dirty and unhealthy places.

At least she got from every foster home a phone to stay in contact with them, but she got seventeen phones and she doesn't knowsknow which one is from which foster home because she has been in so many.
